title: Bonus: Excerpt from "The Faceless Old Woman Who Secretly Lives in Your Home"
description:
An excerpt (read by Mara Wilson) of Joseph Fink & Jeffrey Cranor's new novel The Faceless Old Woman Who Secretly Lives In Your Home.

Coming March 24.

Pre-order now at http://welcometonightvale.com/books.
itunes:subtitle: The first excerpt from our upcoming novel.
itunes:author: Night Vale Presents
